resources.string: Before doing anything on the build of your van everything needs to be nice an clean.
Rust is your enemy. Treat all the rust and you will thank me later.
Design your van, your electricals, ... Plan things out. Use cardboard boxes.
Repair your van where needed. If your wife wants to fix the tailgate that\'s a good idea.
Cut your windows. They need to be done before doing any insulation or what not.
